name: Giant Leap (for Mankind) (Jarrastafari, Kotaya, conner coleman)
name_original: Giant Leap (for Mankind) (Jarrastafari, Kotaya, conner coleman)
description:
Giant Leap (for Mankind) is a single-player platformer in the style of game shows like Total Wipeout and Takeshi's Castle.

Every contestant is a researcher who has to finish the obstacle course to earn funding for their next project. 

Each contestant has one chance to cross the obstacle course, and if they lose, they are ELIMINATED. A new contestant quickly takes their place.

If you win, they earn their precious research grant and the show ends. Well done, enjoy that trip to Alaska to study snowballs or whatever.

Features: 

3D platformer gameplay with wacky obstacles, in SPACE!!!!!
A snarky commentator for the full Wipeout experience
Cool space leaps between obstacles to earn additional funding
35 quirky contestants with unique backstories and victories
Music track and sound design

Credits:
